item.title: ControlsFX Transifex
item.description: ControlsFX Transifex # ControlsFX uses Transifex, which provides a web application allowing translators to write, submit, and manage their translations. ControlsFX is very fortunate to have a team of people who support it by translating the English strings into localized strings. We are always on the lookout for more people to translate ControlsFX into additional languages. If you are able to help, and especially if the language is not already being translated, or is not completed for the next release, then read on!
